Package org.parosproxy.paros.core.scanner

Class AbstractHostPlugin

java.lang.Object
org.parosproxy.paros.core.scanner.AbstractPlugin
org.parosproxy.paros.core.scanner.AbstractHostPlugin
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Object>, Runnable, Plugin, ExampleAlertProvider
public abstract class AbstractHostPlugin extends AbstractPlugin
A Plugin that is called just once per scan, it should be used when testing whole site or server related issues.

The plugin is initialised with the first message being scanned, which the plugin can later obtain to extract host related information (for example, domain, port) for the scan.
